title: Relates to adjournment of school district elections and budget votes in certain school districts
summary: Relates to adjournment of school district elections and budget votes in certain school districts.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         3149

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 24, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by M. of A. CALHOUN -- read once and referred to the Commit-
         tee on Education

       AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to adjournment of  school
         district elections and budget votes in certain school districts

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Section 2022 of the education law is amended  by  adding  a
    2  new subdivision 7 to read as follows:
    3    7.  NOTWITHSTANDING  ANY  PROVISION OF LAW TO THE CONTRARY, THE ANNUAL
    4  DISTRICT MEETING AND ELECTION  OF  THE  HIGHLAND  FALLS  CENTRAL  SCHOOL
    5  DISTRICT  THAT  IS SCHEDULED TO BE HELD ON THE THIRD TUESDAY OF MAY, TWO
    6  THOUSAND ELEVEN IS HEREBY ADJOURNED UNTIL THE FIRST TUESDAY IN JUNE, TWO
    7  THOUSAND ELEVEN. THE TRUSTEES OR BOARD OF EDUCATION OF EACH SUCH  SCHOOL
    8  DISTRICT SHALL PROVIDE NOTICE OF SUCH ADJOURNED MEETING TO THE QUALIFIED
    9  VOTERS  IN  THE  MANNER PRESCRIBED FOR NOTICE OF THE ANNUAL MEETING, AND
   10  SUCH NOTICE  SHALL  PROVIDE  FOR  AN  ADJOURNED  BUDGET  HEARING.    THE
   11  ADJOURNED  DISTRICT  MEETING  OR  DISTRICT MEETING AND ELECTION SHALL BE
   12  DEEMED THE ANNUAL MEETING OR ANNUAL MEETING AND ELECTION OF THE DISTRICT
   13  FOR ALL PURPOSES UNDER THIS TITLE.   NOTWITHSTANDING THE  PROVISIONS  OF
   14  SUBDIVISION  SEVEN OF SECTION SIXTEEN HUNDRED EIGHT OR SUBDIVISION SEVEN
   15  OF SECTION  SEVENTEEN  HUNDRED  SIXTEEN  OF  THIS  TITLE  OR  ANY  OTHER
   16  PROVISION  OF  LAW,  RULE OR REGULATION TO THE CONTRARY, IN TWO THOUSAND
   17  ELEVEN THE HIGHLAND FALLS CENTRAL SCHOOL DISTRICT  PROPERTY  TAX  REPORT
   18  CARD  SHALL  BE  SUBMITTED  TO  THE DEPARTMENT NO LATER THAN TWENTY DAYS
   19  PRIOR TO THE DATE OF THE ADJOURNED MEETING AND THE DEPARTMENT SHALL MAKE
   20  ITS COMPILATION AVAILABLE ELECTRONICALLY AT LEAST SEVEN  DAYS  PRIOR  TO
   21  SUCH DATE.
   22    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.


        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD02799-01-1
